title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure and components of the SistemaInmersivoaprendizajeNeural platform.

title: Develop Neural Interface for Efficient Knowledge Transfer
description: Design and implement a neural interface to facilitate efficient knowledge transfer in the SistemaInmersivoaprendizajeNeural learning platform.

title: Design Efficient Knowledge Transfer Algorithms using Neural Interfaces for the SistemaInmersivoaprendizajeNeural Project
description: This task entails researching and implementing algorithms that optimize the learning process in our immersive learning system by utilizing neural interfaces. The goal is to develop efficient knowledge transfer algorithms that will enhance the user experience and improve the efficiency of our platform.

title: Establish Database Structure
description: Design the database structure for storing user data and learning progress.

title: Implement DevOps Practices for SistemaInmersivoaprendizajeNeural
description: Implement CI/CD pipeline, containerization (Docker), infrastructure-as-code (Terraform or CloudFormation), and other DevOps practices such as monitoring and logging to streamline the development and deployment process.

title: Conduct Security Audit
description: Perform a comprehensive security audit to ensure the platform is secure.

title: Create Comprehensive Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation detailing the system architecture, functionalities, usage instructions, troubleshooting guides, and API references. Also, include a section for security considerations.
